category: Best Actor in a Leading Role
Best Actor in a Supporting Role
Best Actress in a Leading Role

nominations.notes: Judy Holliday was not present at the awards ceremony but watched it with several nominees in New York including fellow-best actress candidate Gloria Swanson. In Hollywood, Ethel Barrymore accepted on her behalf.

category: Best Actress in a Supporting Role
Best Music, Scoring of a Dramatic or Comedy Picture
Best Music, Scoring of a Musical Picture

nominations.notes: Originally Michael Blankfort had been listed for this nomination. Blankfort fronted for Maltz, who was a blacklisted writer at the time. Following research by the Writers Guild of America West in July 1991, the Academy officially attributed the nomination to Maltz and removed Blankford.
